resources.string: This app requires the Microphone permission to run.\n\nPlease grant this permission when prompted.

The Record Audio permission is missing and Android requires this app to have this permission to be able to capture the current music stream. Although this gets displayed as the Microphone permission, this app does not capture microphone data, just the current audio playback

To grant this permission click on Settings, then Permissions and turn the Microphone permission on.

Then click back twice to return to the app
